page.title: 11A school day at Brookmans Pk
page.content: On Monday morning it's hard to get me up and get ready for school. I wash, dress and have toast for breakfast. After putting my coat and shoes on, my Mum drives me to school in her blue Mini Metro.It's not very far to walk but I never have enough time to walk. After the whistle goes in the playground we all line up for assembly. The whole school goes into the hall.We usually have a story and a hymn. Then we go back to our class for lessons. We have maths first and after morning break English.Sometimes we do Science or topic when we can write about anything we like. At lunchtime we have a school meal. Most people have it but some bring a packed lunch.After school is over I go home, have tea and watch television. My favourite programme is'The A Team'.
